announcements.name: SkyBlock Patch Notes 0.19.7 - Garden Pests
announcements.description: Hello! Welcome to SkyBlock Patch 0.19.7. Following a fruitful period pf Alpha testing, today's update includes a whole bunch of creepy crawlies that will be making their way into your garden.

announcements.name: [November 9] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!
